00038     public function usercontrolAction()
00039     {
00040         if ($this->_requests->gets() && is_string($this->_requests->gets()->newuser) && $posts = $this->_requests->posts()) {
00041             $newuser = $this->_getModel()->addNewUser($posts->name, $posts->username, hash('sha512', $posts->password));
00042             if ($newuser) {
00043                 $this->getView()->newuser = $newuser;
00044             } else {
00045                 $this->getView()->newuserfailed = true;
00046             }
00047         }
00048         if ($this->_requests->gets() && is_string($this->_requests->gets()->newgroup) && $posts = $this->_requests->posts()) {
00049             $newgroup = $this->_getModel()->addNewGroup($posts->name, (boolean) $posts->admin);
00050             if ($newgroup) {
00051                 $this->getView()->newgroup = $newgroup;
00052             } else {
00053                 $this->getView()->newgroupfailed = true;
00054             }
00055         }
00056         $this->getView()->pageTitle = 'User Control';
00057         $groups = $this->_getModel()->getGroups();
00058         $this->getView()->users = $this->_modifyUsers($this->_getModel()->getUsers(), $groups);
00059         $this->getView()->groups = $groups;
00060     }
00061 
00068     public function picturecontrolAction()
00069     {
00070         $this->getView()->pageTitle = 'Pictures Control';
00071         if ($posts = $this->_requests->posts()) {
00072             $this->_insertPicture($posts->picturefile);
00073         }
00074         $this->getView()->pics = $this->_getModel()->getPics();
00075     }

00084     public function before()
00085     {
00086         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged()) {
00087             if (Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup()) {
00088                 return true;
00089             }
00090         }
00091         $this->setNext('login','index');
00092         return false;
00093     }
00094 
00104     protected function _modifyUsers($users, $groups)
00105     {
00106         $userArr = array();
00107         foreach ($users as $user) {
00108             if (isset($userArr[$user->uid])) {
00109                 $userArr[$user->uid]['groups'][] = $this->_modifyGroups($user->gid, $groups);
00110             } else {
00111                 $userArr[$user->uid] = array(
00112                     'id' => $user->uid,
00113                     'username' => $user->username,
00114                     'name' => $user->name,
00115                     'aclass' => ($user->active) ? 'active' : 'inactive',
00116                     'groups' => array($this->_modifyGroups($user->gid, $groups))
00117                 );
00118             }
00119         }
00120         $ready = array();
00121         foreach ($userArr as $user) {
00122             if ($user['groups'][0] == null)
00123                 unset($user['groups']);
00124             $ready[] = (object) $user;
00125         }
00126         return $ready;
00127     }
00128 
00138     protected function _modifyGroups($gid, $groups)
00139     {
00140         $selected = null;
00141         foreach ($groups as $group) {
00142             if ($group->id == $gid) {
00143                 $selected = $group;
00144                 break;
00145             }
00146             continue;
00147         }
00148         return $selected;
00149     }
00150 
00159     protected function _insertPicture($picdata)
00160     {
00161         if (is_uploaded_file($picdata['tmp_name'])) {
00162             if ($picdata['type'] == 'image/jpeg') {
00163                 $picinfo = $this->_imageInfo($picdata['tmp_name']);
00164                 if ($pid = $this->_getModel()->addPicture($picinfo->pg, $picinfo->year, $picdata['name']))
00165                     move_uploaded_file($picdata['tmp_name'], PATH_DATA_SITE_IMAGES . '/tmp/' . md5($pid) . $picinfo->filetype);
00166                 ob_start();
00167                 @Galleria_Image::transform();
00168                 $this->getView()->info = ob_get_contents();
00169                 ob_clean();
00170             } else
00171                 $this->getView()->info = 'Unsupported mime-type.';
00172         } else
00173             $this->getView()->info = 'No file imported.';
00174     }
00175 
00184     protected function _imageInfo($file)
00185     {
00186         $exif = exif_read_data($file);
00187         return (object) array(
00188             'pg' => (isset($exif['Model']) ? $exif['Model'] : 'Not available'),
00189             'year' => (isset($exif['DateTime']) ? substr($exif['DateTime'], 0, 4) : date('Y')),
00190             'filetype' => ((exif_imagetype($file) == IMAGETYPE_JPEG) ? '.jpg' : ((exif_imagetype($file) == IMAGETYPE_PNG) ? '.png' :''))
00191         );
00192     }
